lender.name: Torey
lender.loan_because: I loan because I think it is really neat to help a specific person, rather than just giving to an organization.
lender.occupational_info: I am in high school

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Help is needed
lender.occupational_info: retired

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: It feels so good to give back!

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I feel that all people have the right to be happy productive participants in the world
lender.occupational_info: I teach children with special needs

lender.name: Kosuke
lender.loan_because: It gives people opportunities to help themselves.

lender.name: Kit
lender.loan_because: "There's only one rule that I know of: damnit, you've got to be kind." - Kurt Vonnegut
lender.occupational_info: I train monkeys to be service animals for people with mobility disabilities (including spinal cord injuries, ALS, strokes, or severe arthritis). I am also an EMT for the city of Cambridge. In my free time, I compete in triathlons and get lost in the woods (often at the same time).

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I think we all have to do what we can, I always say "no one is getting out alive" but that doesn't mean we can't do some good while we are here.

lender.name: Lauren Honey
lender.loan_because: I want to help people have better lives.

lender.name: Deepa
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance
lender.occupational_info: I learn and make "connections":-)

lender.name: evie
lender.loan_because: a gift was given to me to help someone through Kiva
lender.occupational_info: have raised 3 children,cook, clean, work in the yard, garden, volunteer work in the community and at my church

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work for a manufacturer of construction materials.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I respect anyone that wants to work to care for their family &/or better themselves. I've been blessed or I wouldn't have anything to lend. I'm thankful that my son and daughter-in-law introduced me to Kiva where a loan can be repaid and loaned to another, then another. Being able to see the actual person requesting a loan sticks with me and reminds me that Kiva is a better choice than buying an expensive dinner or things I don't need when these people requesting loans will do so much with so very little. I pray for and wish success to each entrepreneur!
lender.occupational_info: I work a full time job and also own part of a small business.

lender.name: Napoleon Methodist
lender.loan_because: we believe it is part of our responsibility to do and to be God's work in the whole world.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start and run a business even with help! I want to help others become successful.
lender.occupational_info: I sell maternity clothes and breastfeeding supplies as well as baby gifts.

lender.name: Mathew
lender.loan_because: it makes a direct impact on people's lives.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I do not tell the woRld what I can do...I sHow it! sVn
lender.occupational_info: Materials Science, Nanotechnology, Investments & Leisure Travel.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate this life to be able to do so much and have so much and I want to share with others around the world, to better lives for all
lender.occupational_info: Homeopathy is natural health care

lender.name: Carl, Karen & Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I admire people who are willing to work to make their lives better. My wife, young daughter and I traveled the oceans for twelve years on a small sail boat. We met many wonderful people who owned the small shops, market stalls and cafes in the coastal towns we visited. We have been fortunate in our lives and are thankful for the chance to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Both my wife and I are retired. She was a teacher. I programmed computers. Now our daughter is the worker - a student starting 6th grade.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I was introduced to Kiva.org by a good friend. I wish to honor the faith placed in me by that person. I believe he felt that I would see the value Kiva.org provides to our fellow business people in developing areas.
lender.occupational_info: As a marketing consultant, I am hired by small to medium-sized businesses to suggest ways they can sell their products or services.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I have empathy for the difficulties of getting out of poverty. I believe that with the right motivation a little can go a long way. Also, I believe good deeds generate more good deeds, and that the world in general can use more good vibes.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired family physician. I am in the process of learning Spanish because I would like to go to Latin America somewhere and help and/or teach basic health care.

lender.name: angela
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great initiative
lender.occupational_info: I help people work better together

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: I like to give gifts that keep giving!
lender.occupational_info: I explain how methods in urban planning can help prevent individuals from exposures to common, yet widespread toxic chemicals. Most people have about 200 toxic exposures per day.

lender.name: Duncan
lender.loan_because: It helps people help themselves.

lender.name: Suzie
lender.loan_because: I was raised very poor and now have been very successful, I want to help people that are trying to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We have a plumbing company and service people with emergency plumbing problems.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: so little can make so much difference and helping a person learn to fish is better then trying to feed the world.
lender.occupational_info: Easy, very little time involved and I love that I am making a difference.

lender.name: Miki
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves the chance to have a better life and be happy. I would like to connect with the people around the world.

lender.name: Katherine and Nick
lender.loan_because: We hope we are able to make a small yet significant contribution to making the world a better place.

lender.name: Lesly
lender.loan_because: This is a Mothers Day gift from my Son in law and Daughter. They are wonderful people and soon to be parents and want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a travel consultant.

lender.name: sarah
lender.loan_because: i want to help like people have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: i translate specialist written language into plain language that non-specialists can easily understand. Also, i analyze the way businesses do things to help them to work more efficiently.

lender.name: Dami
lender.loan_because: I am grateful about the possibilities I have as a German citizen. I want to give back something and help a little bit to make this world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to learn new things such as to help other people to overcome horrible events like rape or a disaster. i also help teachers to work better with violent students and show them ways to improve their teachings.

lender.name: stacy
lender.loan_because: I want to help women in poverty to improve their own lives through building sustainable businesses.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I have read about the success micro-lending brings to people and wanted to help those in a more difficult situation.
lender.occupational_info: I am attending law school.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I love to help other people in need. I am into the ministry of helps.
lender.occupational_info: I have been blessed beyond measure and feel the need to share the blessings with others.

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to struggle, and studies show those who give the most are those who are in the least position to do so. I believe it's part of my service to the world to help others any way I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find information in books, magazines, in videos, and through the internet. I also teach people how to use databases and computers. I hope to help people in ways that will make a positive difference in their lives.

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: When you really need money ,banks do not lend you even a small amount. I am not a bank and perhaps lending a few dollars can make a great difference

lender.name: May and Jennifer
lender.loan_because: We loan in hopes to make a difference and give those less fortunate and opportunity to realise their dreams

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: if everyone does a little bit then together we can do a lot!

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I want to see others less fortunate have a way of surviving and improving their lives by way of small gifts from those who have to give.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: If people are in a position to do so, when thought deeply about, it seems to me as socially responsible and, to be honest, it really seems pretty selfish not to. Through advertising we are encouraged to waste countless cash on unnecessary 'stuff' (mostly for ourselves and next a few close to us) when people need basics, Crazy. I wish the media would stop telling us that the normal way to live and find happiness is pursuing generally selfish wasteful consumption, instead of giving people a helping hand when you can.

lender.name: kachis
lender.loan_because: Microlending is a fantastic way of helping those places and people make the most of their talent and potential.I appreciate being able to participate in that.

lender.name: Yoshitsugu
lender.loan_because: Everybody is a friend

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I believe we are one world and credit should not be an statement of privilege.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the non-profit world, trying to improve how organizations and create better ways to help those who in need.

lender.name: peter
lender.occupation: legal recuriter & owner of EMC SEARCH
lender.loan_because: It is the way to win over the world. This is a foreign policy that works.

lender.name: Juanita
lender.loan_because: I need to make a difference in the world
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of 3 and a grandmother of 2

lender.name: Canadian Tool and Supply
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for all the chances I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: Distribution of tools and industrial supplies.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I can, because I believe in human determination, because I believe in empowering people, because I just believe in people... just because...

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: women of the world need empowerment.

lender.name: Dave & Terri
lender.loan_because: We have seen what these small loans can do to help people. We first became aware of them while working in Dhaka, Bangladesh. Our daughter introduced us to Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: We were school teachers in various countries around the world: Taiwan, Singapore, Indonesia, Czech Rep., Egypt, Bangladesh.

lender.name: Tatsuo
lender.loan_because: kiva offers me great opportunities to help people who needs help.
lender.occupational_info: do research and education in a university.

lender.name: Sherrill
lender.loan_because: My daughter introduced me to KIVA- to help others.

lender.name: Bob and Ann
lender.loan_because: We have been fortunate to have good jobs and a steady income. It is time to share with others in need
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Internal Medicine department at the Naval Hospital Pensacola, Florida in the United States. Most of my patients are retired military and over the age of 50.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I like to pay it forward...
lender.occupational_info: I help people design and build surroundings in which they can enjoy their friends and family.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: Each one reach one!
lender.occupational_info: Care, Confidence and Connection through Horses. We reach out to kids and connect with them through our horses.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am 10 years old and in elementary school.

lender.name: Loralyn
lender.loan_because: What might seem like a small amount of money to me can have a huge impact on someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am in graduate school studying to be a microbiology professor and researcher.

lender.name: Paquette Family
lender.loan_because: I want to help others, especially women, to make a better life for themselves and their families
lender.occupational_info: I train employees in the company where I work, to perform their job responsibilities safely and efficiently.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I can. What feels like a small loan to me can make a large difference. Bravo Kiva! May all the entrepreneurs on this site continue to be courageous & prosperous.
lender.occupational_info: My wife Lauren & I founded Wisdomology.com to help promote personal and planetary peace. It's an amazing community of people all over the world who are sharing the wisdom of their lives. I invite you to join us!

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: After traveling and meeting so many people working hard to survive, I realized it only took a little support and love to help.
lender.occupational_info: I assist the employees of my company in improving their skills and talents in the workplace and as individuals.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I believe in the idea - and it helps put things in perspective when I get stressed about money.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: It's a small but powerful way for me to positively change someone's world for good.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: I love all people.
lender.occupational_info: Help people in need of public assistance through government programs.

lender.name: Helen
lender.occupation: Retired administrator with State of Ohio

lender.name: Robin
lender.occupational_info: I help take care of the costumes used onstage in the Broadway (New York City) musical The Lion King (as well as some other shows). In addition to doing repairs and such, I help the actors get into & out of the costumes during the show.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: My stepdaughter gave me the Monther's Day gift of being able to help other women financially. I think this could be addictive!
lender.occupational_info: I help families protect their lifestyes and their abillity to recieve quality care when they neeed help to just get through the day by designing an insurance policy to cover their future expenses for care.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I have seen poverty in Africa first-hand and know how the entrepreneurial spirit deserves to be fostered. Women, in particular, in Third World Countries ,strive constantly to improve life for themselves and their families. They deserve a helping hand from those who are more fortunate.

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.loan_because: I received a wonderful Mother's Day gift from our son, Michael... a Kiva gift certificate!!!

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I received a Kiva gift certificate for mother's day 2008. I love seeing the faces and reading the stories of the people that are working to make better lives for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Nelson
lender.loan_because: I make loans to help other people out, and I find it rewarding. I also made one loan as a Mother's Day gift.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a computer to design structure for jets.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I was informed about the program through a Cultures class at my highschool, and I want to be that one chance that ever person in this world should get with a simple loan.

lender.name: Pay It Forward
lender.loan_because: we want to be of service to our global community and become personally involved in our world by financially assisting those in need.
lender.occupational_info: We are a school organization working with students who are interested in making a difference in the world and becoming civic-minded leaders.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: I would like to help someone else to get started, the way I would like to have someone help me if I needed it.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired but I do volunteer work. I have always enjoyed working very much.

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: This starts as a 40th birthday gift from my friends and family. It is truly a gift that keeps on giving. I want to BE the change that I want to see in the world.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: "I wondered why somebody didn't do something. Then I realized, I am somebody."
lender.occupational_info: I work at a local Outreach that among many things, assists people with rent, utilities, food, and clothing.

lender.name: Jacob & Dana
lender.loan_because: we know that the first few hundred dollars is always the hardest, but once you get started, nothing can stop you.
lender.occupational_info: Jake is an attorney and project manager at a non-profit real estate development company in Camden, NJ. Dana is a public relations specialist working for a national PR firm based in Los Angeles

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the daily operations at a golf course. I also teach to help improve the ability of my clients.

lender.name: Madge
lender.loan_because: It's a good cause and they really help people with almost all money going to the people who need it and not to run the organization.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist who paints abstract paintings and a mixed media artist.

lender.name: Svetlana & Daryl
lender.loan_because: We want to help people live better.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to the children of immigrants and Daryl is a computer developer.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: The gift just keeps on giving!
lender.occupational_info: I am a Chicago-based consultant helping people to better market and/or sell their products and services.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want to promote the concept of microfinance
lender.occupational_info: I value companies.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: i got loan money as a mother's day gift.What a great idea to be able to"mother" some other folks in need of a helping hand
lender.occupational_info: I am a ceramics teacher.I teach kids from 3-18 and their moms handbuilding and potters wheel techniques.We all have a great time making a mess

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help sometime in their life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a shop that sells plants and flowers.

lender.name: dr. martin
lender.loan_because: Helping others is happiness!

lender.name: _h_
lender.occupational_info: thinking & writing & teaching

lender.name: Duane
lender.loan_because: It makes sense. I believe if we all are each others customers we will never go to war. With that in mind I want to help people improve their lives through business ownership.
lender.occupational_info: I provide people with the opportunity to improve their lives through business ownership.

lender.name: Robert Harbin-McGee
lender.loan_because: Giving is essential. Many people have helped me throughout my life. I think & believe we are all One - We are all in this together. No matter what our backgrounds, lifestyles, circumstances: Each one of us is just one strand in the fabric of humanity - We are all connected in this way - We all matter. When I assist another - it is my brother, or my sister . If my assistance is useful, wanted, needed, and effective - we all benefit.
lender.occupational_info: Due to medical reasons, I can no longer work - but that does not mean I can not remain useful, productive, and do what I can to assist others. My passions include Music; "The healing effects of music"; Horticulture and Environmentally Friendly and Conscientious Landscape Design. Contributing in ways that empower others. Patient Advocacy - Registered Nursing

lender.name: Nadine
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the chance to become successful on their own terms.
lender.occupational_info: I tell people in my community about local problems and solutions, and invite them to become involved in making it a better place for us all to live in by donating money or time.

lender.name: Mary Ruth
lender.loan_because: My daughter gave me a gift certificate for Mother's Day in order to make a loan. What a wonderful gift for Mother's day - to have a daughter whose heart reaches out to others. My heart is blessed, and I am grateful for the opportunity to share.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: we are all in this together.

lender.name: Entrepreneurial Mom
lender.loan_because: It's nice to help others realize their dreams, support the creative business spirit and improve the lives of children
lender.occupational_info: Every Mom knows what I do all day!

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I love to help people and I believe in micro-loans.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: ... because I can

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: it's more satisfying than low interest rates.
lender.occupational_info: A bit of everything ... Look for a better way to direct capital to support more efficient social investing.

lender.name: Andy and Nicky
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs stuff
lender.occupational_info: I repair machines in a huge steel factory and she cleans up after messy americans

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: As a former teacher in home economics my interest was always in sewing. I started my own small business (costume design) on small business loans and now that I've retired I want to help others with their own small business.
lender.occupational_info: I continue to sew and do alterations on the vintage clothing I am selling. I am also starting a small sewing school for teens and young adults who want to learn to sew.

lender.name: grvr ticket scout
lender.loan_because:
Spread the Culture of Peace and enable people helping people via directly - globally.
We are interested in funding people who craft musical instruments and helping to market them on the internet, please get in touch!
lender.occupational_info:
Our website helps people find local small concerts - the music people make for each other -- right next door.
We are the only site to offer 'name your price' concert tickets ... so check it out - we're donating some of our profits to kiva projects.
Music brings people together.
PEACE!

lender.name: Mona
lender.loan_because: it`s about justice and hope.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: family and education very important to me.
lender.occupational_info: taking care of my family and home.

lender.name: Kathrin
lender.loan_because: I believe in the effectiveness of microlending.

lender.name: Letty
lender.loan_because: My daughter gave me the money that I loned as a gift for mother's day last year. I will continue to reloan her gift as long as Kiva exists. Her gift to me will hopefully help someone manifest their dreams. This is what giving is all about. My daughter's gift to me has helped me manifest one of my dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Office work. Not very exciting but it pays the bills.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: MicroLoans work when large aid programs don't.

lender.name: Sipra
lender.loan_because: We need to help each other through life with love and sharing.
lender.occupational_info: I help people stretch their bodies and calm their minds so that they feel good, taking away aches and stresses from their daily being through Yoga. I help people to cook healthy and delicious foods. I also do Reiki, which is healing aches through gentle touch.

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: My son, David, introduced me to KIVA and sent me a gift certificate for Mother's Day. I've always loved helping people and this is a wonderful opportunity to do so.
lender.occupational_info: For 34 years I've enjoyed helping people sell their homes and find new homes.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone has a purpose and can contribute something to the world. I want to help them.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to make something of themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help young people at school every day!

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: My son gave me this gift of Kiva for Mother's Day and I look forward to helping someone who wants to make a better life for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I am presently volunteering with a local hospital and enjoy my work.

lender.name: Alice & Mom
lender.loan_because: My Mother's Day gift from son

lender.name: Cristina
lender.loan_because: It's a small way that I feel that I can help the people that need it most.
lender.occupational_info: I feed people!

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: It is effective. What more can be asked of small acts but that they be effective?

lender.name: Belgian
lender.loan_because: I realize how many opportunities we get thrown into our lap just because we were born in a rich country, that others have to work hard for.
lender.occupational_info: I keep a travel blog about Belgium, with information about beer, museums, partying, nature, chocolate, fashion ...

lender.name: Andrew Dergousoff
lender.loan_because: I understand the dreams, struggles and sacrifices that come along with being an entrepreneur. Living in Canada has afforded me access to resources that might not be available to other entrepreneurs in developing countries. I would like to help people with big dreams to pursue their ambitions.
lender.occupational_info: Aurelia Couture designs clothing and accessories. We stay fresh by commissioning graphic and garment artists around the globe to produce original pieces.

lender.name: SunnyRaindrops
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do. God has blessed me so much and in so many ways and even though I'm not rich by American standards I am so excited to be able to help others out with their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a souvenir shop.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: I believe that women helping women is a small way that I can help to empower and change a life for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher's assistant, and I work in an elementary classroom with students that struggling with their learning.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I'm trying to reverse gender inequality by empowering women through economic opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I study a lot! I'm also the co-founder of a group called University of Oregon Students for Global Health, which strives to raise awareness of preventable diseases (mainly AIDS, malaria and tuberculosis) and raises funds for an organization called Partners in Health (PIH).

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have a chance to succeed in life. I have economic students that help me collect pennies every semester to loan to Kiva entrepreneurs. They like to be a part of making the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school students economics and sociology.

lender.name: Carrie and Robert
lender.loan_because: This portfolio is kept in memory of Carrie (1939 - 2008). Carrie went through more than anyone should have to as a child, but always maintained a positive outlook and zeal for life - learning, traveling and helping others. Her unrelenting spirit for life was an inspiration to all who knew her. Carrie wanted this portfolio to help women around the world who were taking care of their children and involved in agriculture or food production. Being an orphan herself and a volunteer teaching art to children in orphanages, I know Carrie would also find a personal joy in assisting women who have taken in orphans.

lender.name: Ardis
lender.loan_because: My daughter made me aware of a wonderful way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired but enjoying a full life as a wife, mother, grandmother and great-grandmother.

lender.name: william
lender.loan_because: It is by far the most effective international aid mechanism.
lender.occupational_info: I evaluate how pollutants move through groundwater and research methods for producing clean water.

lender.name: Alise
lender.loan_because: I care...
lender.occupational_info: Be an individual under Gods' direction...to proclaim the gospel to all possible, in every way, everywhere...encouraging the who-so-evers to evaluate the spiritual aspect of their lives, and make sure they have been born again {asking God the Father in Jesus Christ name, to forgive you for all sin, invite Him into your heart and guide your life by His spirit...ensuring your eternal destiny. I enjoy seeing others prosper and be in health also, therefore if I can help my fellowman in all ways possible...GREAT.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I love to see people working toward a goal and trying to improve things.
lender.occupational_info: I work on projects that involve green technology and transportation.

lender.name: Ransom Family
lender.loan_because: we want to learn about and help people all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: Building computer technologies for small businesses.

lender.name: Chris and Joe
lender.loan_because: we understand the power of financing
lender.occupational_info: we are students of medicine.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to help others continue to lift themselves up and really know in their hearts that what they need is on the way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a bookkeeper for 3 small businesses - a construction company, a chocolate company (yum!) and a marketing group.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I wish to help others
lender.occupational_info: I answer the phone and pass the caller on to the correct person

lender.name: Amit
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserve an opportunity to better ones life.

lender.name: Rosemarie
lender.loan_because: because we all should think of more than ourselves.

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: Loaning is more than providing money. It's showing the folks who borrow that there are people who care about them and are rooting for them to succeed in business and in life. This can be as uplifting and uniting as any aspect of the program. Also, I think the program promotes social justice and access to a decent life and through this peace and understanding.
lender.occupational_info: I bring amusement, laughter, warmth, and companionship to my human housemates. This lifts their spirits, reduces their stress, boosts their immune system, and helps them keep their petty concerns in perspective.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want the poor to prosper. I want a fairer world. I want the world to live in community.
lender.occupational_info: I make medicine out of herbs and use cups, needles, and oils to make people better.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: It is a necessary part of expressing my gratitude for the good life I have.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my family and help my local school district apply for funding through grant applications.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than myself
lender.occupational_info: I'm an aerospace engineer.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I feel like it gives me a connection to people around the world and encourages me to learn more about where they live. I think Kiva is a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I do web development and manage information technology services for a manufacturing company in st louis.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I hope this will make the world a smaller place. I exclusively loan to people manufacturing or selling liquor, or dealing with goats in some manner.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I am a small-business owner myself, and like to support others across the world doing the same.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have muscular injuries, and help them to get better.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I am a mom and want other moms to be able to care for their children with dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I run a school that helps college students learn how to become teachers for very young children.

lender.name: Wilson
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together

lender.name: suzanne
lender.loan_because: Because the Lord loves a cheerful giver. Because I have so much. Because they have so little. Because for what it costs to feed my cat I can change someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I do administrative social work specializing in a feeding program for home day care settings.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: it's wonderful to be able to help people directly, even in this small way. Today I joined and made three loans in honor of my mother, Thelma Carter, who died in 1997, and who cared so much about helping people throughout the world better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization that promotes international educational and cultural exchange.

lender.name: SOPHIA
lender.loan_because: there is no other choice

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: We all need to help others less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a manufacturing company. I support network, hardware, and software issues within the company.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving back and helping others who are trying to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach teenagers in a school of 1250 students. I have taught English, careers, foods, nutrition, parenting, physical education, and health.

lender.name: Dale and Kathy
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed in life. We have a great marriage, wonderful children and grandchildren, a home and health. We just want to bless others in every way we can.

lender.name: Barrett
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are helping themselves under difficult circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I help others learn how to communicate better about their work, so they can get good jobs and succeed.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: My daughter got me started with a Mother's Day gift. Great gift...Great daughter!

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small firm that partners with US and state-level governments to conduct research on the impact and effectiveness of publicly funded programs in health and education. Currently working on a project to evaluate the impact and effectiveness of a federally funded program in increasing the quantity and quality of HIV primary medical care available in areas heavily impacted by HIV/AIDS.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.occupational_info: I type and publish technical manuals to fix airplanes.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: After a life changing trip volunteering in Guatemala, I realized that we can make a real difference in the lives of others. I am always looking for ways to to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I am the mother of four children and I work part-time at a coffee shop.

lender.name: sanjar
lender.loan_because: God is the reason why I loan! I know I was born to impact many lives in this world cause that's my purpose.
lender.occupational_info: I m an individual who owns a business that develops leaders! Leaders that bring destroyed families together, help young and older generations to understand the true meaning of honor, integrity, responsibility and most importantly understand not "who" we are but "WHOSE" we are!

lender.name: Robert and Izzy
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Signe
lender.loan_because: I like to give people a chance to build something
lender.occupational_info: I work at The Aid Agency, an advertising agency in Copenhagen. We focus on awakening consumers who (like ourselves) want to change the world by supporting sustainable brands/products.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: There but for the grace of God go I.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a big company to help people do better in their work and feel happy about their work.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I am grateful that I am able to help others aroung the globe, especially weavers and sewers.
lender.occupational_info: I am unable to work due to back injury.

lender.name: Mary Kay
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do in a global community.
lender.occupational_info: We work with children so that they might reach their own potential.

lender.name: Azule Navarre
lender.loan_because: It is better to give a hand up than a hand out. We in the US are so blessed it is not only our privilege but our moral obligation to give back to those who have less.
lender.occupational_info: I design websites.

lender.name: LuAnn
lender.loan_because: A relative gave me a gift certificate, The best gift I can imagine!
lender.occupational_info: Branch Manager of Financial Institution. I provide education and help people achieve financial goals. I also farm. I raise sheep and grass hay.

lender.name: Matt Murphy
lender.occupational_info: I am a fitness instructor and a personal trainer. I am also a high school coach of American Football.

lender.name: Sonja
lender.loan_because: to help others in the world
lender.occupational_info: shop assistant

lender.name: Trent
lender.loan_because: Good people have invested in me. I hope to do the same for others.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I believe it is what Jesus would have me do.
lender.occupational_info: primary school teacher

lender.name: Margeaux
lender.loan_because: I want to build capital by investing in the people's futures.
lender.occupational_info: I help expand the charter school movement to provide better, high quality school options for children in California.

lender.name: Dolf
lender.loan_because: I truly believe in the power of being able to make other people's dreams of self reliance through owning their own business a reality.
lender.occupational_info: I work with local people in Bali, Indonesia, creating opportunities for exporting local arts and crafts to the rest of the world.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: it's in my brother who passed away last October

lender.name: Jessikah
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. I want to help someone better their life and do good for themselves. I believe that the littlest things can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a server (waitress). It can be hard and frustrating at times, but can also be pretty fun at the same time.

lender.name: anju
lender.loan_because: i believe in helping others
lender.occupational_info: to listen and find solutions for people

lender.name: Mike & Kathy Storey
lender.loan_because: we realize how fortunate we are to be Canadians. we want to make it possible for others to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: We belong to Rotary and our Rotary motto is service above self. This is one of the things that we can do to help make this a better world.

lender.name: Nadege
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help needy people. Scientific studies have shown that spending money on others promotes happiness. Also because it is so easy to send money just by clicking; I'm to lazy and selfish to do more. I managed to convince myself that I have more altruistic motives but this is probably all confabulations.

lender.name: Yuvaraja Subramaniam
lender.loan_because: they need and I could
lender.occupational_info: I develop software for an Investment bank

lender.name: Efosa
lender.loan_because: The only difference between meand someone living in poverty is the fact that I was born into affluence and they weren't. And I had absolutely nothing to do with that. Knowing this, how can I not?

lender.name: Nutrition & Hunger 139
lender.loan_because: Our student group at San Jose State cares about nutrition and we want to see these families given the opportunity to expand their nutritional resources.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of over 30 San Jose State University Students who are enrolled in Nutrition & Environmental Hunger (139)

lender.name: ttar
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I design biomass boilers

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: Most lasting changes start at the grassroots level. Ending poverty means looking carefully at wealth. If we have much and our neighbors have little, we are called on behalf of love to give to them.
lender.occupational_info: Research to develop a vaccine or drug treatment for a parasite called leishmania

lender.name: Marthinus en Sonja
lender.loan_because: we want to make a better future for outselfes and others,we currently have a kitchen in a pub & grill that we are leasing from the owner ,we do good but we want to improve our services and give more work to those that does not have something to put on their tables for themselfes and their children - Thanks for your support - GOD BLESS
lender.occupational_info: Long hours and Hard

lender.name: Smri
lender.loan_because: The idea of microfinance is an absurdly good one and I'm glad somebody managed to implement it in a relatively secure, relatively peer-to-peer way. I'll do what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I organize projects regarding digital fabrication, peer-to-peer education and grassroots innovation in an attempt to break the current models of assumption that are manufacturing poverty and inequality on a global scale... amongst other things.

lender.name: Kitty
lender.loan_because: Our oldest son gave me a $25 certificate as a present one year and I have continued to lend it back, time after time. Thank you for this opportunity!

lender.name: Del
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and it is fun to watch people succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I manage 8 Estate Wineries in Canada. We specialize in Icewine.

lender.name: Jeannette
lender.loan_because: Kiva offers an amazing way to fight poverty through peer-to-peer microloans. Genius!
lender.occupational_info: Scribe Marketing, Inc., offers a creative, critical approach to marketing with an emphasis on quality content.

lender.name: Vivian
lender.loan_because: When I was younger I worked very hard to better the lives of women in my own country. But it was always my wish to also reach out to women in other countries, I just was never sure how to best do so. I was so happy to hear of this organization on the radio, just what I had in mind. Thank you so much for creating such a wonderful organization. I know how much of yourselves you put into it.

lender.name: Tisha
lender.loan_because: sometimes we all need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: Down to earth and artsy- glass, clay, and gardening.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people setting up and expanding their business.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software for chess tournaments.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I feel we all need to give back in any way we can, be it big or small.

lender.name: KansasKate
lender.loan_because: I can. And you can, too.

lender.name: margaret
lender.loan_because: My sister invited me to this website and inspired me, and I believe in helping people - especially women - improve their lives and their family's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with teachers - we help one another become even better at getting students at our school to learn and grow.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: Growing up myself in a developing beautiful country island such as the Dominican Republic i know the struggles and sacrifices that underprivileged and dedicated families go through to feed and support their own. I also find that my good deeds are always repaid double somehow. And it also makes me feel that I have contributed in someway in bettering this sometimes unkind world we all live in. Even if it's just a little bit at a time!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that conducts socio-economic research.

lender.name: zenith
lender.loan_because: I have been truly blessed in my life and would like to share my good fortune. It also provides a good example in helping my children grow into compassionate and individuals.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to change someone's life.

lender.name: Autumn
lender.loan_because: I feel micro-credit loans provide great opportunites for people in harsh living conditions, from people who have money to spare. It also creates valuable connections between people located all over the world.

lender.name: Kit
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Manage customer service people at a water utility company in California, USA.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to have a spare $25 every now and then.
lender.occupational_info: I am a starving graduate student. If I have $25 here and there, anyone does.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I don't have much money to help others. With KIVA, my contribution, combined with the conributions of others, can make a real difference in a person's life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach World History and World Geography to 14, 15, and 16 year old high school students.

lender.name: Teppei
lender.loan_because: I want to see improving business and happy.

lender.name: Dolores
lender.loan_because: My family and I are very fortunate to have the means to be able to help others.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I believe in providing people the means to pull themselves out of poverty if they're prepared to work. And I know life can be very tough so I'm happy if I can be of help. All the best in your enterprises!
lender.occupational_info: I run development teams providing specialised software for the financial markets.

lender.name: Marysol
lender.loan_because: I believe that businesses help improve a country's economy by providing for income, jobs, expansion, etc.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the MGM Grand Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA. I take the hotel phone calls and transfer to the correct departments/guests.

lender.name: Maria Esther
lender.loan_because: I tried to pick someone that sees beyond their immediate needs and tries to expand and provide jobs to others by growing. The more jobs created the more people lifted from poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Presently retired. Television/advertising executive

lender.name: Bess & Milagro
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a secretary, but I am studying to become a Math and Spanish teacher.

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: It is one way to make a difference to a community, and to promote education. And it is a way of giving thanks.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I've been very lucky in my life, spread the love even if it's a little at a time and to who you choose.

lender.name: Faleaana
lender.loan_because: We should all have a servant's heart :)
lender.occupational_info: Office job...enough said

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupational_info: My job is to provide medical care to sick and injured people in emergency situations.

lender.name: Deja
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are trying to support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help kids stay out of trouble and hold them accountable for their actions.

lender.name: patricia
lender.loan_because: inspiration and empowerment is contagious

lender.name: sisters hairdressing
lender.loan_because: professional am a hairdresser am ust doing it in my house in mombasa and am trying to find ashop but it expensive with family to raise .i bought a sewing machine to help me with some money and tried to purchase some equipment it helps.anyway am trying to open my own shop and train people .like droupouts and women .this my goal.
lender.occupational_info: am a a hairdresser for 10 years doing it in the house and planning to get a shop and some dryers and styling chairs and sinks.to start a class and train young generation and women .i bought already a sewing machine and trying to buy more and train young girls too how to sew so they can develop in themselves.
